title: Mac Client can't fit the screen
body: Mac, 7.4 LOL client. When the game launched, the window is too big, I can't see the full picture of the game. The most annoying part is even the option menu is too big, and I can't even scroll down to click "Okay", so I can't make any change to things like resolution, fullscreen/window. I tried to change the resolution of my Mac, but the option is still too big for me to make changes. Is there a way to change sitting without launched the game?

replies.body:
Try CMD and - at the same time to shrink the client size after opening the client -- this will work for the updated client, not the legacy one. 

Let me know if that works for you!
